text:
DGCI grants permission for restricted emergency use of Russia's #SputnikV.
The #vaccine demonstrated 91.6% efficacy against #COVID19.
It is set to be sold at Rs. 250 per shot.
India is facing #vaccineshortage after a sharp rise in the cases of #coronavirus.
#Corona #CoronaVaccine https://t.co/nId3eJkH3r
